Test Name: Peutz-Jeghers Syndrome, STK11, Full Gene Analysis
Purpose: Detect known and novel variants in the STK11 gene for diagnosis of Peutz-Jeghers Syndrome.
Container: EDTA tube (for blood) or buccal swab collection device
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, nucleic acid quantification instrument, PCR thermal cycler, agarose gel electrophoresis apparatus, Sanger sequencer or NGS platform, bioinformatics software
